name: Kinetic™ Rush Ripstop Sneaker - Men's
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features: Upper: Synthetic nubuck leather on rear quarter with ripstop nylon forefoot. No-sew TPU film overlays add layer of depth to the design. Reflective webbing on heel pull with TPU heel clip stabilizer. Plush internal heel pocket for lockdown and comfort
Footbed: Removable molded PU-Like EVA footbed with cloth topcover
Outsole: Hi-traction rubber outsole with innovative Kelvin wake pattern lug design for optimal flow and path of least resistance movement
